flow.informationArchitecture: Hierarchical: global filters → table rows (assets) → columns (metrics: APY, providers, yield type). Data is scannable with clear visual separation.
frictionPoints: No clear CTA for users to start earning (links are data-driven, not action-driven)
Service provider logos are small and may be hard to tap on mobile
APY ranges are wide (e.g., <0.01%-600.00%) making comparison difficult without clicking
No obvious 'Get Started' or 'Connect Wallet' affordance on this view
